snippet: The universities announced a new nonprofit partnership, known as edX, that will offer vast new learning opportunities for students around the world.
abstract: Harvard University and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology announce nonprofit partnership, known as edX, to offer free online courses from both universities; program will compete with similar partnership between Stanford, Princeton, the University of Pennsylvania and the University of Michigan.
lead_paragraph: The universities announced a new nonprofit partnership, known as edX, that will offer vast new learning opportunities for students around the world.

headline.seo: Harvard and M.I.T. Offer Free Online Courses
headline.main: Harvard and M.I.T. Team Up to Offer Free Online Courses
headline.print_headline: Harvard And M.I.T. Join to Offer Web Courses
